participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, always looking for the next thrill on my skateboard.
participant_1.background: i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders. i have a broken arm.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, I find joy in baking and crafting, bringing warmth to those around me.
participant_2.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
